Acid Splash.description: You hurl a bubble of acid. Choose one or two creatures you can see within range. They must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 acid damage.

Blade Ward.description: You extend your hand and trace a sigil of warding in the air. Until the end of your next turn, you have resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.

Booming Blade.description: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon’s normal effects and becomes sheathed in booming energy until the start of your next turn. If the target willingly moves before then, it immediately takes thunder damage.

Chill Touch.description: You create a ghostly skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes necrotic damage and can't regain hit points until the start of your next turn.

Control Flames.description: You choose nonmagical flame that you can see within range and affect it in one of several ways, such as expanding, extinguishing, or animating the flame.

Create Bonfire.description: You create a bonfire on the ground that fills a 5-foot cube. Any creature in the bonfire's space when you cast this spell must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take fire damage.

Dancing Lights.description: You create up to four torch-sized lights that hover in the air, shedding dim light in a 10-foot radius.

Decompose (HB).description: You accelerate the decay of organic matter, causing a creature to take necrotic damage and reducing its Constitution temporarily.

Druidcraft.description: Whispering to the spirits of nature, you create one of several harmless sensory effects such as the sound of falling leaves or predicting the weather.

Eldritch Blast.description: A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes force damage.

Encode Thoughts.description: You extract a thought from your mind and transform it into a tangible string of glowing energy, which is stored in your hand.

Fire Bolt.description: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes fire damage.

Friends.description: You gain advantage on all Charisma checks directed at one creature of your choice that isn’t hostile toward you.

Frostbite.description: You cause numbing frost to form on one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw, taking cold damage on a failed save and having disadvantage on the next weapon attack roll it makes.

Green-Flame Blade.description: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon’s normal effects, and green fire leaps to a second creature within 5 feet of it, dealing fire damage.

Guidance.description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice.

Gust.description: You seize the air and compel it to create one of several effects, such as pushing a creature or moving objects.

Hand of Radiance (UA).description: You hold your hand aloft and create burning radiance that erupts around you, dealing radiant damage to nearby enemies.

Infestation.description: You cause a cloud of mites, fleas, and other parasites to appear momentarily on one creature you can see. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take poison damage and move randomly.

Light.description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius.

Lightning Lure.description: You create a lash of lightning energy that pulls a creature within range closer to you. The creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pulled toward you and take lightning damage.

Mage Hand.description: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action.

Magic Stone.description: You imbue up to three pebbles with magic. A creature can make a ranged attack with a stone, dealing magical bludgeoning damage on a hit.

Mending.description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as a broken chain link or a torn cloak.

Message.description: You point your finger toward a creature within range and whisper a message. The target hears the message and can whisper a reply that only you can hear.

Mind Sliver.description: You drive a disorienting spike of psychic energy into the mind of one creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or take psychic damage and subtract 1d4 from its next saving throw.

Minor Illusion.description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. The illusion ends if you dismiss it or cast it again.

Mold Earth.description: You choose a portion of dirt or stone that you can see within range. You can move it, shape it, or change its appearance.

On/Off (UA).description: You can activate or deactivate a nonmagical device, such as opening or closing a door or turning off a light source.

Poison Spray.description: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take poison damage.

Prestidigitation.description: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice. You can create small sensory effects, clean or soil an object, or warm or chill items.

Primal Savagery.description: You channel primal magic to sharpen your teeth or nails, making a melee spell attack that deals acid damage.

Produce Flame.description: A flickering flame appears in your hand, shedding bright light. You can hurl the flame at a creature within range, making a ranged spell attack.

Ray of Frost.description: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes cold damage and its speed is reduced.

Resistance.description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice.

Sacred Flame.description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take radiant damage.

Sapping Sting.description: You sap the vitality of one creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take necrotic damage and fall prone.

Shape Water.description: You choose an area of water that you can see within range and manipulate it in one of several ways, such as moving, freezing, or shaping the water.

Shillelagh.description: The wood of a club or quarterstaff you are holding is imbued with nature's power, making it magical for the duration.

Shocking Grasp.description: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch. On a hit, the target takes lightning damage and can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

Spare the Dying.description: You touch a living creature that has 0 hit points. The creature becomes stable.

Sword Burst.description: You create a momentary circle of spectral blades that sweep around you. All creatures within range must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take force damage.

Thaumaturgy.description: You manifest a minor wonder, such as creating booming sounds, causing flames to flicker, or altering your voice.

Thorn Whip.description: You create a long, vine-like whip covered in thorns that lashes out at a creature in range. On a hit, the target takes piercing damage and is pulled closer to you.

Thunderclap.description: You create a burst of thunderous sound that can be heard up to 100 feet away. Each creature within range must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take thunder damage.

Toll the Dead.description: You point at a creature you can see within range, and the sound of a dolorous bell fills the air. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take necrotic damage, with increased damage if it is missing hit points.

True Strike.description: You point a finger at a target in range. Your magic grants you a brief insight into the target's defenses. On your next turn, you gain advantage on your first attack roll against the target.

Vicious Mockery.description: You unleash a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at a creature you can see within range. If the target can hear you, it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take psychic damage and have disadvantage on its next attack roll.

Virtue (UA).description: You touch a creature and imbue it with vitality, granting it temporary hit points for 1 round.

Word of Radiance.description: You utter a divine word, and burning radiance erupts from you. Each creature of your choice within range must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take radiant damage.
